dcterms:creator: X. Xi-wei
W. Xi-yan
Y. Gui-hua
T. Xi-bin
L. Kang
dcterms:description: Earthquake catalog containing data on earthquakes in mainland China, used for identifying earthquake risk areas and predicting future seismic events.
dcterms:title: Earthquake Catalog of Mainland China

dcterms:description: Data from the US Geological Survey and National Seismological Center, used for earthquake prediction and analysis.
dcterms:title: Earthquake Data from US Geological Survey (USGS) and National Seismological Center (NSC)

dcterms:description: Historical earthquake data covering the period from January 15, 1966, to May 22, 2021, used for analyzing trends and patterns in seismic activity.
dcterms:title: Historical Earthquake Data (from January 15, 1966 to May 22, 2021)

dcterms:description: Dataset containing the number of earthquakes recorded per month, used in case study 1 for prediction modeling.
dcterms:title: Earthquake Data for Case Study 1 (Number of Earthquakes per Month)

dcterms:description: Dataset containing the maximum magnitude of earthquakes recorded per month, used in case study 2 for prediction modeling.
dcterms:title: Earthquake Data for Case Study 2 (Maximum Magnitude of Earthquakes per Month)
